text: Mariah Shade (born 9 December 1991) is a Trinidadian footballer who plays as a forward. She has been a member of the Trinidad and Tobago women's national team. ==International goals== Scores and results list Trinidad and Tobago' goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" |- ! No. !! Date !!
